title: Guardian Newspaper – 2022 Serious Allegations about the Integrity of Michelle Mone
author: admin
summary: Part of an article published by the Guardian Newspaper on the personal conduct and integrity about House of Lords member Michelle Mone.
content:
The Conservative peer Michelle Mone and her children secretly received £29m originating from the profits of a PPE business that was awarded large government contracts after she recommended it to ministers, documents seen by the Guardian indicate.
